title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.351 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.351 - Scope

State Regulations

Sections 255.353 through
255.379
of this Part prescribe
minimum requirements for installing customer meters, service regulators, service lines, service line valves, and service line connections to
mains. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.351

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
